titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Betsy Pittman.

address.addressline1: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Betsy Pittman in January 2005.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: The collection contains correspondence, clippings, notes, and memorabilia associated with the Class of 1929 and Mr. Anderson's role as class representative to the Alumni Association.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Mr. Charles "Chick" Anderson graduated from Connecticut Agricultural College in 1929. For almost seventy years, he served as the class representative to the Alumni Association.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, clippings, notes, and memorabilia associated with the Class of 1929 and Mr. Anderson's role as class representative to the Alumni Association.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I: Papers (undated, 1949-1996) includes correspondence, clippings and memorabilia pertaining to the University and Mr. Anderson's activities as the Class of 1929 Alumni representative.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University's history. See especially, University Memorabilia Collection as well as the papers of Robert F. Belden, A. J. Brundage, James R. Case, Fitts Family, Donald and Margaret Gaylord, Albert C. and Ralph D. Gilbert, Charles G. Hall, Lena Hurlburt, Howard Merrill, Lawrence F. Morico, A. J. Pierpont, Phil Samponaro, August Schulze, Randolph and Beatrice Whaples, and Stanley D. Woodmansee. Relevant administrative collections include the records of the Alumni Association, Departments, Board of Trustees, President's Office, the Commencement Collection, faculty papers and subject files. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: The following materials have been separated from the collection(s) and integrated into the larger University collection:
Random issues of the student newspaper; commencement programs and invitations; periodicals produced by University departments, divisions or student groups; photographs; and course bulletins.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Charles Anderson Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were donated by Mr. Anderson.
